ul.li: The "background-size" property sets the background size of an element.

body.p: If statement above is true, the flag images of this paragraph should have a background size of auto. The rule applied is "id1 {background-size: auto;}" Also "id1 {background-image: url(flagbg.gif);}". aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa body.p: All other properties of this page should be UA-default. This is a paragraph like the one above. However, it may not be big enough to support a background image.
